actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from the Department of Veterans Affairs and Office of Management and Budget.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to correct an inequity in the provision of veterans' educational assistance benefits.

summary.text: Includes veterans receiving class instruction on a regularly-scheduled basis (but not necessarily a weekly basis) among those qualifying for educational assistance benefits. (Current law allows such benefits only for veterans attending qualifying courses on a weekly basis.)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to correct an inequity in the provision of veterans' educational assistance benefits.
